name: Maso Marble
description: MasoMarble is maybe the hardest marble game in the world. 28 levels, only the best players can beat them all.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 730 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 960 Storage: 200 MB available space
